Ubuntu has held a <nowiki>[[UbuntuGlobalJam|Global Jam]]</nowiki> for the last few releases, and have scheduled one for the weekend of 7th - 9th of September. We've participated in several previous ones, so we should do so this release cycle also!

=== Locations ===
* When: Saturday September 8, 2012
* Where: Wikimedia, San Francisco
* RSVP link: http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-california/1918/detail/
* We will be doing ISO and application testing
* Summary
